DOC.brief_summary: Despite long tradition complementary alternative medicine ( CAM ) therapies hardly interventional trial type 2 diabetes mellitus . Hence pilot study aim investigate influence two week integrative inpatient therapy quality life 50 patient suffer diabetic neuropathy . Integrative treatment include aspect conventional traditional European Chinese medicine , mind-body medicine , physical therapy lifestyle modification ( nutrition advice , stress management exercise training ) . The observational design intend four measurement point : tree month ( T0 ) , directly ( T1 ) , directly treatment ( T2 ) three month follow-up ( T3 ) . The subjective evaluation neuropathy-related quality life combine neurophysiologic instrument ( QST ) , measure neuropathic symptom . Also pain intensity , locus control , interpretation illness , cop style , anxiety/depression , life satisfaction several biomarkers ( HbA1c , ABI , WHR BMI ) measure . In addition qualitative interview give view patient perspective therapy process .
